name: Automated LinkedIn Lead Generation with AI Email Personalization (NOT FINISH)
description:
Lead Machine (NOT FINISH)

Who is this for?
This automation is ideal for sales teams, business development professionals, and marketers looking to build a targeted prospect database with automatic qualification. Perfect for agencies, consultants, and B2B companies wanting to identify and prioritize the most promising potential clients.

What problem does this workflow solve?
Manually researching companies on LinkedIn, evaluating their fit for your services, verifying emails, and preparing personalized message sequences is time-consuming and subjective. This automation streamlines lead generation by automatically finding, qualifying, and importing qualified prospects into your CRM.

What this workflow does
This workflow automatically searches for relevant profiles on LinkedIn based on your criteria, retrieves detailed information about each contact, identifies key decision-makers, generates and verifies their email addresses, creates personalized messages based on the prospect's LinkedIn activity, and adds them to your Google Sheet CRM.

Setup
Create a Ghost Genius API account and get your API key
Configure HTTP Request nodes with Header Auth credentials
Create a copy of the provided Google Sheet template
Set up your Google Sheet and OpenAI credentials following n8n documentation
Customize the "Set Variables" node to match your target audience and scoring criteria

How to customize this workflow
Modify search parameters to target different industries, locations, or company sizes
Adjust the profile count threshold to refine your qualification criteria
Customize the AI scoring system to align with your specific product or service offering
Adapt email templates to match your communication tone and value proposition
Add notification nodes to alert you when highly qualified companies are identified
